title: Mozambique - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Mozambique stands at CCC+ with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Mozambique was last set at Caa2 with positive outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Mozambique was last reported at CCC+ with n/a outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Mozambique thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Mozambique as reported by major credit rating agencies.
